WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${rowStart} AND ${rowStart-1}+${displayRowCount} -- OFFSET ${rowStart-1} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${displayRowCount} ROWS ONLY -- oracle12c
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ_PROJECT(PRNO, PRTITLE, PRSTARTDATE, PRENDDATE, PRDATE, USERNO, PRSTATUS, DELETEFLAG) VALUES (PRNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prtitle}, #{prstartdate}, #{prenddate}, SYSDATE, #{userno}, '0', 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT PRNO, PRTITLE, PRDATE, PRSTARTDATE, PRENDDATE , PP.USERNO, USERNM, PRSTATUS FROM PRJ_PROJECT PP INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON PP.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE PP.DELETEFLAG='N' AND PRNO=#{field1}
SELECT PRNO FROM PRJ_PROJECT WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' AND PRNO=#{prno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ_TASK(PRNO, TSNO, TSPARENT, TSTITLE, TSSTARTDATE, TSENDDATE, TSENDREAL, TSRATE, DELETEFLAG, OLDNO) SELECT #{field2}, TSNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TSPARENT, TSTITLE, TSSTARTDATE, TSENDDATE, NULL, 0, 'N', TSNO FROM PRJ_TASK WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' AND PRNO=#{field1}
